title: About
body: Hello, I am **Sarfraz Ahmed**, a self-taught programmer from Karachi, Pakistan mainly involved in PHP, MySQL, HTML/CSS, JavaScript/jQuery for around 6+ years now. I also have bit of experience with Android platform. I am also Pakistan's top user on [StackOverflow][1] by reputation holding Gold badge for the tags PHP, Javascript, jQuery, HTML and CSS. [1]: http://stackoverflow.com/users/139459/sarfraz

title: Projects
body:
PHP (Personal)
---------------

 - **BloggerCMS**
 - [EZPHP][1]: Light-weight PHP Framework with MVC Design Pattern.
 - [PHP-Execute][2]: PHP Code Runner!
 - [Good Todo][3]: Keep track of your tasks and todos
 - [Save Page Complete][4]: Class to save pages in single file with all CSS and JavaScript

PHP (Professional)
-------------------

 - [Donors Impact][5]: A donation giving website for the universities
 - [CosmicJeans][6]: A website to buy jeans
 - [SpySure][7]: Website with services to monitor what employees are doing.
 - [French District][8]: A multi-purpose French website.
 - [Zawiya][9]: Religious and culture related website
 - [UK Exam][10]: Website with an exam system for those who want to come to United Kingdom
 - Various other projects that could not go live
 - Various Facebook Apps

Javascript
----------

 - [Slidr][11]: jQuery plugin to create beautiful HTML Presentations !
 - [HTML5Sticky][12]: Sticky Notes App for the Web !
 - [StyleTable][13]: jQuery plugin to style html tables!
 - [DropShadow][14]: jQuery plugin to apply drop shadow effect to any element!

Mobile
------

 - [My Goals][15]: Android app to save tasks/todos/goals !
 - [Caller Details][16]: Android app to show caller details when they call !
 - [Magic Dialler][17]: J2ME/JavaMe app !

CSS
---

 - [Twitter Bootstrap Admin Template][18]: Make app's backend good-looking !
 - [Free Admin Template][19]: Another admin template !
 - [Pakistan's Flag][20]: Flag of Pakistan with pure CSS

Browser
-------

 - [Webnote][21]: Chrome browser extension + backend to help you save pages and do research !
 - [Facebookify][22]: Greasemonkey script to inject instance of Facebook object into pages !

Others
------

 - [Pak SMS][23]: Software made in VB6 to send free SMS to Pakistan !


----------

> **Technologies**: php, javascript, jquery, css/css3, html/html5, mvc, wordpress, joomla, codeigniter, laravel, opencart, backbone,
> angularjs, android, git, svn, agile, etc

title: Contact
body:
To get in touch, [Twitter][1] or [Email][2] is best (depending on the length of the message). I’m also on [LinkedIn][3].

----------


> *[Hey! I am available for hire ;-)][4]*


  [1]: http://www.twitter.com/sarfraznawaz
